attributes.additional_details: My late mother was diagnosed with cancer last year and sadly lost her fight but the use of the oil reduced her seizures dramatically & made her final days more comfortable and less stressful. A last resort and we as a family saw the benefits first hand. All I ask is you ask yourselves what would you do if you had months to live and there was nothing that could be to save you?? ITS TIME TO CHANGE and I will fight to get cannabis legalised in the medical profession. Please help me fight for this.
attributes.background: Hundreds of thousands of people suffer from cancer in the uk and there is plenty of evidence that the use of cannabis oil can ease the symptoms and even cure the illness. A natural plant with huge medical benefits and proven to work as research In Other countries prove. STOP THE COVER UP NOW!
